changeSet.author: fabian.lobo
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO ${table.prefix}_USER_SETTINGS( ${table.prefix}_LOCALE, ${table.prefix}_TIMEZONE, ${table.prefix}_VERSION, ${table.prefix}_CREATED_BY, ${table.prefix}_LAST_MODIFIED_BY ) VALUES ('es_ES', 'Europe/Madrid', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('pt_PT', 'Europe/Lisbon', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('es_CO', 'America/Bogota', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('es_MX', 'America/Mexico_City', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('zh_CN', 'Asia/Shanghai', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('zh_TW', 'Asia/Taipei', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('en_GB', 'Europe/London', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('en_US', 'US/Eastern', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('fr_FR', 'Europe/Paris', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('ar_SA', 'Asia/Riyadh', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('nl_NL', 'Europe/Amsterdam', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('en_AU', 'Australia/Sydney', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('en_CA', 'Canada/Eastern', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('fr_CA', 'Canada/Pacific', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('de_DE', 'Europe/Berlin', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('he_IL', 'Asia/Tel_Aviv', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('hi_IN', 'Asia/Calcutta', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('it_IT', 'Europe/Rome', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('ja_JP', 'Asia/Tokyo', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('pt_BR', 'America/Sao_Paulo', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('sv_SE', 'Europe/Stockholm', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('th_TH', 'Asia/Bangkok', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}'), ('nb_NO', 'Europe/Oslo', 0, '${value.user}', '${value.user}');
